forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of patchy fog early. Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 16C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of patchy fog early. Mainly cloudy. High 64F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening. A few showers developing late. Low 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening. A few showers developing late. Low near 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. High 17C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 63F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 16C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy late. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 59F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. High near 60F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 52F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 56F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening, then clear overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 13C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 56F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 57F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 49F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 57F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.
